sources.title: Optimistic tragedy
sources.description:
Based on the play of the same name by V. Vishnevsky. 1917 The Central Committee of the Bolshevik Party sends its commissar to a warship, where the influence of the anarchist Leader is strong. The Commissioner is a beautiful woman. The sailors greet her with obscene ridicule, but she demonstrates an iron character, proving her right to be a leader.

Year of production: 1963

Director: Samsonov Samson
Writers: Samsonov Samson, Vishnevetskaya Sofia
Composer: Dekhterev Vasily
Operator: Monakhov Vladimir
Production designers: Voronkov Sergey, Novoderezhkin Ippolit

Cast: Vsevolod Safonov, Margarita Volodina, Vyacheslav Tikhonov, Boris Andreev, Vsevolod Sanaev, Orvo Bjerninen, Ivan Zhevago, Daniil Netrebin, Valentin Belokhvostik, Joseph Vankov, Garin Erast, Alexey Glazyrin, Grigory Mikhailov, Veronica Nedobrovo-Buzhinskaya, Peter Sobolevsky, Strizhenov Gleb, Strizhenov Oleg, Shulgin Victor
